dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: Vincent, I saw your latest grades, and you've improved a lot!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Yes, Mom, I've been working hard on my studies.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: I might have misunderstood your situation with Yvonne before. It seems that studying together has indeed been helpful.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Yes, we support each other, and studying together has been really effective.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: I might have misunderstood your situation with Yvonne before. It seems that studying together has indeed been helpful.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Yes, we support each other, and studying together has been really effective.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: However, now that there's only one week left until the college entrance exams, it's the final sprint. I hope you can stay focused and give it your all.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: I understand, Mom. I'll concentrate and make sure to perform my best in the exams.

dialogues.name: Mom
dialogues.content: I believe in you. You've always been hardworking, and now it's just about maintaining that momentum until the end.

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Thank you, Mom. I won't let you down.
